template.name: function GOOD standalone
template.value:
def $name$(one,two): """ $name$ """ if not one or not two: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(one,str) and isinstance(two,str)
print (f"{x} {y}")
assert one and two , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$(one=1,two=2) $END$

template.name: function use external vars
template.value:
v="no" def $name$(one,two): """ $name$ """ if not one or not two: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(one,str) and isinstance(two,str)
global v nonlocal w v="yes" print (f"{one} {two}")
assert one and two , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$(one=1,two=2) $END$

template.name: function multiple results
function with MUST_NAMED default args
template.value:
# при вызове функции все аргументы обязаны быть именованными
def $name$(*,one=11,two=12): """ $name$ """ if not one or not two: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(one,str) and isinstance(two,str)
print (f"{one} {two}")
assert one and two , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$(one=1,two=2) $END$

template.name: function oneline aka lambda
template.value: def func(left, mid, right): return left + mid + right

template.name: function GEN yield with for
function decorator
template.value:
#функция перенесет все __метаданные на обёртку декоратор from functools import * @wraps(func)
$END$

template.name: function GEN simpliest
template.value:
#генераторные функции это одноразовый итератор def $name$(): """ $name$ """ yield "one" yield "two" yield "three"
for i in $name$(): print(i) $END$

template.name: function GOOD LIST input argument
function SUPER standalone FOR ALGO
template.value:
# <editor-fold desc="$bfs$"> def $bfs$(data): """ $bfs$ return result""" result=[]
return result
def main_$bfs$(): """ starter for $bfs$""" data1 = { 1:[2, 3], 2:[1, 3, 4], 3:[1, 2, 4], 4:[2, 3]}
input_=data1 result=$bfs$(input_) print("MAIN $bfs$: ", result)
if __name__ == '__main__': main_$bfs$() # </editor-fold>
